question: What are the prevailing themes in the social media posts of CFOs in companies that have reported deal closures with enterprise software vendors in the last quarter?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have reported deal closures with enterprise software vendors in the last quarter. [CompanyDealMaster]
Extract social media posts made by CFOs of these companies. [PersonaUser, PersonaLinkedinPost]
Determine the prevailing themes in these social media posts. [PersonaLinkedinPost]
